title.rendered: Reimagining the Employer Trust Score—Encore Webinar

content.rendered:
At Handshake Access, we discussed how Handshake is seeking to expand access to relevant opportunities for your students while balancing student trust and employer access. Right now, our education partners play a time-intensive role in maintaining that balance via the approvals process. Based on conversations with schools and employers over the past year, we’ve identified opportunities to make employer and job approvals more nuanced, transparent, and safe.

In July 2021, we gave an encore presentation to review our plans to enhance approvals via updates to decline reasons, flagging, and the Trust Score, as well as discuss the benefits and implications for schools, employers, and students. Review the recording below.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out to your Relationship Manager or our Support Team with any additional questions. You can also join us for virtual office hours to talk to the Handshake team about these updates.

View all career center webinars
